title: NOTICEBOARD The Social Brain: inaugural conference
abstract: An inaugural conference on ‘The Social Brain’ will be held at the Bibliotheca Alexandrina, Alexandria, Egypt from 24–27 April 2002. Further information may be obtained from: Congrex Göteborg AB, PO Box 5078, SE-402 22 Göteborg, Sweden; fax +46 3181 8225; www.congrex.com/socialbrain
